title: This Pathfinder RPG's weakest class is a poisoner in a game where nearly everyone is immune to poison, but after two years it's about get a lifesaving overhaul
description: Assassins, welcome to the big leagues.

title: Your whole life is secretly a deadly reality show in American Arcadia
description: Try the demo for a game where a man is condemned to death for bad ratings.

title: Upcoming RTS-RPG fusion dares to ask big questions like 'What if the Vikings were riding dinosaurs?'
description: Build a castle and don't get eaten by a T-Rex, seems simple enough.

title: Arkane shows it hasn't given up on Redfall with a substantial new update, but it's hard to imagine a Cyberpunk-style turnaround is in the cards
description: It's nice to see some bug fixes and combat improvements, at least.

title: Weirdo indie RPG Knuckle Sandwich will finally release in November
description: We previously described Knuckle Sandwich as "like Earthbound for adults."

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer for #841 Sunday, October 8
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: Following layoffs at CD Projekt Red, staff have formed a union for Polish game developers
description: There is power in a union.

title: Dave the Diver gets crabs and lobsters this month, among other new stuff, in its first content update
